ingredients: 3 cup(s) cooked turkey, diced into bite-size pieces
1/2 cup(s) diced green chile, roasted and peeled (feel free to substitute frozen or canned)
1 cup(s) red chile enchilada sauce, I used this NM Red Chile Sauce
1 small jalapeno, seeded and very finely minced (optional)
1 14-ounce can(s) or 1 1/2 cups cooked black beans
1 14-ounce can(s) or 1 1/2 cups cooked red beans
1 14-ounce can(s) or 1 1/2 cups cooked great northern beans
1 14-ounce or 1 1/2 cups cooked light red kidney beans
6 cup(s) turkey stock or chicken stock
1 teaspoon(s) granulated garlic or garlic powder
1 - 2 teaspoon(s) kosher salt, adjust to taste
Optional Toppings: sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese, crumbled tortilla chips
Optional Toppings: sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese, crumbled tortilla chips
Optional Toppings: sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese, crumbled tortilla chips
